Description:
Outstanding downsizer or premium investment opportunity.
Perfectly situated at the end of an exclusive cul-de-sac, 54 Delungra Avenue, will not disappoint the astute buyer, downsizing retirees or the savvy investor. On entering, you will notice the well-designed features with a spacious feel and distinction of this home. The stunning kitchen features stainless steel appliances with a generous island bench with beautiful tile flooring which leads to a sun filled dining area. Boasting 3 generous bedrooms, all with built in robes with the master having a walk in robe and ensuite. This impressive home has ducted gas heating throughout with an additional split system. The double remote controlled garage has internal access. The property is situated on a 462sqm allotment (approx.) and has an outstanding bushland aspect from the timber deck entertaining area. This well presented family home is located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a short stroll to public transport, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private, multiple choice of shopping centres close by & access to the Bellarine Peninsula's world class restaurants & wineries. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.
Insights: 54 Delungra Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Expansive family home with loads of potential.
Sale by SET DATE 18/1/2019 (unless sold prior)
When a classic Clifton Springs home like 4-5 Wanawong Court presents itself to the market the astute buyer will immediately see the unlimited possibilities this property has to offer. This vast and versatile property, totalling 1452sqm (approx.), offers a clean, blank palette to create the ultimate family home. Featuring a classic floorplan design, complemented with 3 bedrooms, with the master bedroom having its own ensuite and walk in robe. A spacious lounge room offering a log fire heater brings charm to the home which is a rare feature in modern homes these days. The practical kitchen has been recently fitted out with a new electric cooktop and oven and has been offset with feature slate flooring which flows into the formal dining room. What sets this property apart from the majority of the residential homes in Clifton Springs is the allotment size. Featuring a magnificent kidney shape concrete pool and spa, your summer oasis is already designed and ready for use. Side access to an expansive backyard will enable those with a boat, jetskis or a caravan to be able store them off street with ease. To compliment the home a 9m x 6m brick garage is perfect for the tradesperson or the small home business. This well presented family home is located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a short stroll to public transport, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private, multiple choice of shopping centres close by & access to the Bellarine Peninsula's world class restaurants & wineries. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.
Insights: 4-5 Wanawong Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 62 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Value Still Exists!
On offer here, in a highly sought-after pocket of Clifton Springs, is this 3 bedroom home with great potential.
Perfect for those looking to add value, this property is a great blank canvass to renovate, extend or even subdivide (STCA). The home is comprised of a large living area to the front of the home, a neat and tidy kitchen area and 3 bedrooms, a central bathroom with separate toilet. Outside the home a veranda overlooks the back yard and attaches to a large double car garage.
The location of this property, in combination with the 586m2 approx offers space and convenience.
Positioned in one of the most desirable areas of Clifton Springs, this loved home is located just a short walk from the Clifton Springs Bowling Club and pristine Clifton Springs Golf Club. Also a short drive to local shopping centres, cafes, schools & medical facilities! Don't forget everything the Bellarine has to offer, boat ramps, bay, beaches award winning wineries & ferry services.

Address: 99 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
DECEASED ESTATE
This is your chance to develop your dreams! This uniquely located property oozes potential. Make no mistake - this home is ready for the wrecking ball, however that's not to say a bit of elbow grease won't go a long way!
Comprising 2 bedrooms, central bathroom, kitchen over-looking the living space, separate toilet and large laundry. An additional multipurpose room at the rear of the home, sunroom and deck complete this simple abode which is set upon a whopping 899m2. This rare parcel of land overlooks the beautiful neighbouring Valley and offers modest Bay views.
Other features include - Gas cooking, split system heating and cooling, established gardens, garden shed and direct access to the Valley.
Located only minutes from all amenities and the Bay, this potential development site (STCA) is ready and waiting for you to create your Bellarine Dream.

Address: 10 Flinders View Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
A Symphony of Style in the Springs!
Tucked away in a tranquil setting with breathtaking views across Corio Bay to the magnificent granite peaks of the You Yangs! The secret is out on this functional, social and stylish home, that has forged a design statement in a French Provincial-Hamptons fusion.
The main living/dining area with its direct access to the alfresco setting is north facing and showcased in brilliant texture of vertical lining panels. The ambient eco-ethanol fireplace with the matt-noir panel surround and bookend cabinetry, is a dreamy focal point of the space. The rattan pendant shade defines the dining area with a breezy coastal vibe. A timeless black & white kitchen strikes a classic chord. Showcased with quartz stone benches, textured Masia Blanco tiles, a s/s double butlers sink with a vintage-style chrome & ceramic mixer. The cooking hub, walk-in pantry and wine rack command the epicurean rights. The upper-level formal lounge is snug with elegant dado wall panels. This elevated room evokes ultimate relaxation, amplified with its balcony views that are protected through a design and development overlay (DDO14). The bathrooms are luxurious, surrounded by marble-streaked porcelain tiles flush to ceiling. With in-situ showers, rainfall heads and bluetooth ceiling speakers. The ensuite boasts a floating vanity, and the main bathroom is styled with a freestanding tub, provincial quartz stone & timber louvre vanity and a rod+globe chandelier.
The outdoor setting with its zoning, is a playground for the whole family. A well thought out garden design of landscaped beds, innovative TifTuf Berumuda couch turf and notable tree life. Particular features are a central floating staged-deck; and a play area scaled to small children. With carpet grass; sandpit; chalkboard and cubby house.
The sleeping quarters are separated with two queen sized bedrooms, and the two minors zoned in their own hallway. All bedrooms offer built-in closet organisers. A climate-controlled interior with ducted heating/cooling throughout. Boosted with split air-con in minor bedrooms and the upper level lounge. Not even the laundry misses out, with raw textured timber benchtops, cabinetry matching the kitchen, and a stunning Spanish Encaustic tiled floor. Functionality with vehicles is well catered to with the DLUG and 8x6m boat/caravan bay. A spacious abode with the promise of enviable living for the whole family. Seeing is believing!
Insights: 10 Flinders View Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Dont Settle For Less
Situated in one of the most revered streets in Clifton Springs, this show stopping home will amaze you from the moment you enter. With a 6+ car garage, sweeping bay views all set upon a 647m2 block - Don't wait to secure your dream home!
First impressions are everything with this home, as you are greeted by the manicured and low maintenance front garden. Upon entry to the home, you are welcomed by the first living area/rumpus room, internal access to the unique 6+ car garage which will impress most, offering an abundance of storage extra height and width; complete with a convenient powder room.
The hardwood timber staircase will lead you to the heart of the home, where your expectations will be exceeded! French double doors open into the light filled, open plan living/dining & kitchen. The living encompasses built-in cabinetry and a beautiful gas log feature fire. The spacious kitchen overlooks the dining/living and is equipped with a dishwasher, gas cook-top, 2 separate electric ovens, an abundance of storage and all serviced by a walk-in-pantry. This open plan area is the true heart of the home where you will enjoy entertaining and will be the envy of all your friends with divine sweeping Bay views from every angle.
The grand master bedroom sits at the fore of the home with a walk-in-robe and ensuite. Sliding doors from the master allow access to the main front balcony where every single sunset is on offer! The remaining 2 bedrooms are both generous and host walk-in-robes with a versatile 4th bedroom/study . The upper level of the home is completed by a timeless central bathroom with bath, double shower and large vanity, separate toilet and a huge laundry with ample storage and outdoor access.
Centrally positioned and with access from both the dining and also the rear of the home, the expansive decked undercover entertaining area is going to be your favourite area of the home allowing you to entertain in style all year round; boasting an open fire place surrounding an in-ground spa which has its own handy cover that doubles for an entertaining table with access into the back garden; both entry points include safety lock doors.
Completing this impressive package, is a large grassed backyard which includes a garden shed and mature fruit trees.
The fantastic thing about this home is the abundance of practical extra features including oversized garaging with the option to accommodate caravans, boats etc. external staircases on either side of the house, expansive balcony with custom café blinds and STUNNING Bay views, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, feature cornicing, ducted vacuum, 2 x 5000lt water tanks and secure side gates.
This home is truly a unique package with all that is has on offer including the location. You are flanked for choice when it comes to amenities, within proximity to the Bay, boat ramp, shops, schools, public transport and all Clifton Springs, Drysdale & the Bellarine has to offer.
An inspection is a must to truly appreciate the quality craftsmanship and calibre of living, start living your coastal lifestyle today!
Insights: 27 Narawi Ave, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
NO NEED TO BUILD, FABULOUS HOME + SOLAR ....EXCELLENT PROPORTIONS.
Take the hassel out of renovating or building , it is all here at no. 22 , just unpack and entertain. Wide light filled entrance, formal lounge, second open plan living with dining , well designed kitchen and generous living , adjacent third rumpus/theatre room .......flexible for personal requirements, all living spaces open to outdoor area. The master is extra big with WIR and full ensuite (spa bath), three more bebrooms with fitted BIR'S, central bathroom , separate toilet and laundry. Features include dishwasher, S/S 900 upright stove, central heating, evaporative cooling, split system, loads of storage, pantry and more. Undercover paved areas so easy to entertain from all livng areas. Double garage (insulated) , this home is as new, come to the open , make an appointment with me , you will not be disappointed.

Description:
Auction Cancelled - Vendors Terms Met Prior to Auction
A truly exclusive and limited opportunity presents to secure what can only be described as top shelf real estate on the Bellarine Peninsula. Character filled features and a renovation of the highest calibre is sure to delight a prospective buyer with an eye for quality. An enviable land holding of 605m2 (approx..) shares a boundary with the picturesque Clifton Springs Golf Course and from the elevated site it boasts commanding panoramic views.
The free-flowing floor plan cascades over three levels and showcases grand proportions and light filled living areas with a stunning rear northerly orientation
4 bedrooms; the master suite is complete with a contemporary ensuite and walk in robe
The primary living zone of this fine residence occupies the entire upper level; consisting of a kitchen/family/meal space. Expansive floor to ceiling windows promotes an abundance of natural light and perfectly frame the rolling green fairways, the shimmer of the Corio Bay through the tree tops and impressive granite peaks of the You Yangs.
A glass sliding door creates a seamless connection to an oversized decked alfresco with plumbed BBQ without a doubt an entertainer's dream
A sleek kitchen design is nothing short of eye-catching; dual stone benchtops, Bosch dishwasher, stainless steel appliances (including a 900mm gas cook top), custom cabinetry and a walk-in pantry provides excellent storage solutions.
The generous family/lounge zone is warm and welcoming; a gas log fire emits lovely radiant heat and is flanked by an artisan vertical timber wall feature, exposed brick and towering raked ceilings (with exposed timber beams).
The lower level is dedicated to a guest wing; 2 bedrooms are serviced by a modern family bathroom, study, rumpus and unrivalled storage further endorses this property's clever design and user-friendly nature. A 4th bedroom or 3rd living area creates further flexibility to what is already an adaptable floor plan
A garage spanning 8.8m x 5.7m (approx.) is room enough to house the cars and a dedicated area for a work shop/studio
All the modern comforts and an impressive inclusions list to be discovered on further inspection
If you desire an additional holding of approximately 605m2 please note that 14 Catalina Crescent, Clifton Springs can be purchased. See attached link:
https://www.nevillerichards.com.au/buying/VIC/Geelong-and-District/Clifton-Springs/Land/1P4222
Insights: 16 Catalina Crescent, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
SOMETHING DIFFERENT
Have you been looking around and finding that the homes you are seeing are all the same? Well this one breaks that mould. This split level home has character and views from a mezzanine level. In a quiet street of Clifton Springs this family home is designed to entertain inside and out. The kitchen invites you to sit and chat at the bench allowing everyone to interact and enjoy time together. The Mezzanine level opens onto a deck where the views across Corio Bay change daily. You can watch the ships, yachts, fishermen and the fireworks or just relax. Lead light adds colour to doors and highlights. Recently refurbished bathroom is bright and light. The hot weather over summer is controlled by two air conditioners with air circulated with ceiling fans. The ambience in winter is tangible with a gas log fire. The vendors tell me the home is so toasty in winter they only need short sleeves. But wait there's more. When buying a home generally they get their ticks from the kitchen and the shed. Well here we have a near new kitchen and a fantastic Man Cave. Clifton Springs is fast becoming a suburb known for supplying all the amenities you need to work, rest and play. There are excellent schools to choose from. Options for shopping include a range of supermarkets and complexes. Medical Centres, sporting groups, restaurants, wineries, walking tracks. I have enjoyed the lifestyle here for over thirty years. It's time to share it. If you are unable to attend the open for inspection private inspections are welcome.
Insights: 8 Almerta Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
CAPTIVATING VIEWS
The chance to build your dream home in a premier location rarely comes about. Here, at 29 Narawi Avenue Clifton Springs you have that opportunity. Blocks of land with a generous size of 681m2 and a 20m frontage are hard to find and allows the prospect of designing a spacious family home. With breathtaking views across Corio Bay, the Westerly aspect affords a panoramic outlook from Geelong, around to the You Yangs and beyond towards Melbourne. The gradient of the land is sloping and it would be unrealistic to be built out. This view will remain protected for generations to come. After you've built your forever home, you'll be the envy of family and friends whenever they come to visit. Clifton Springs and Drysdale is only a 20 minute drive to Geelong and just 10 minutes from first-class golf courses, wineries, the Portarlington-Melbourne Ferry and everything that the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula has to offer. Or you might be just as content, sitting on a balcony, enjoying the view. Call today for more information. Titled land doesn't last long.
Insights: 29 Narawi Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019.

Address: 4 Edge Water Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
ABSOLUTE WATER FRONTAGE
Looking for the best buy on the block, then look no further ! Absolutely one of the premiere positions on the waterfront in Clifton Springs. Beautiful north facing views to Corio Bay and the You Yangs.
This solid older home on slab foundations will lend itself to a simple update or a magnificent second story renovation STCA. A perfect home for the retiree. The expanse of living areas - lounge, kitchen and dining at the front of the property all secure views of the water. Two generous bedrooms, a rear sun room or third bedroom and fully renovated bathroom. Plenty of storage shedding for the gardener or home handyman and a lock up garage.
Clifton Springs is a central location on the Bellarine within 15 minutes drive to all attractions.
Inspect to appreciate the waterfront lifestyle.

Description:
Dream, Build and Embrace
This absolute prime parcel of land backing onto the picturesque Clifton Springs Golf Course presents a truly limited rare as hens teeth opportunity to dream, build and embrace the ultimate seachange lifestyle residence!
605m2 (approx.) with an enviable frontage of approximately 20m serves up options a plenty.
Secure Colorbond fencing secures the front boundary, concrete driveway, car/boat port with high clearance and additional shedding provides great value-add features.
The A1 location of this fine land holding cannot be overstated!!
The Bellarine Peninsula provides a wonderful seachange lifestyle; award winning wine labels, a vibrant restaurant and café scene, fantastic boating infrastructure, beautiful parkland and some great local Golf Courses (with one of them literally on your back doorstep).
Buy and build your dream home or secure a wonderful investment for the future!

Address: 81 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Majestic Views
Proudly sitting on the crest of Bay Shore Avenues renowned hill, this grand home enjoys majestic views of Geelongs city skyline, Corio Bay, Port Phillip Bay, You Yangs & Clifton Springs golf course. The open plan upstairs lounge dining and new kitchen all flow seamlessly out onto the large north facing balcony through multiple access points allowing you to watch sunrises and sunsets each day coupled with a second all season alfresco entertaining deck with its own unique views of Victorias 2nd largest city. Upstairs the home comprises 3 bedrooms, 2 bathroom, kids rumpus room, open plan north facing living and newly renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances; whilst downstairs has a further bedroom or home office, oversized laundry with WC, double garage and huge billiards room and teenagers retreat. Set on an enviable 683sqm block within walking distance to the Clifton Springs Golf Club, The Dell water front, walking tracks and marina, this is a rare opportunity to secure the best views on the Bellarine Peninsula.

Description:
Often Sought but Rarely Found Own TITLE!
A rare opportunity has presented itself in the form of a completely refurbished unit, in addition to the generous backyard this unit is also separately titled which is a huge BONUS!
Tucked away in a quiet pocket of Clifton Springs, not too far away from all your amenities stands 1 out of 2 units which includes a sizeable front garden. The home comprises 3 bedrooms, the master with ample walk-in-robe and ensuite including vanity, toilet and shower; the remaining 2 bedrooms fitted with built-in robes. A light and airy open plan kitchen, meals and living certainly makes for the hub of the home. A practical kitchen with plenty of bench and cupboard space including gas cooking and dishwasher cavity. Main bathroom and laundry with separate toilet complete this spacious package.
The rare advantage to this home is the additional garden space that you would not normally expect with unit living, freshly landscaped awaiting your personal touches.
Features of the home include split system heating and cooling, NEW floating floor boards, window furnishings, floor coverings and light fittings; security doors, fly screens, single lock up garage and side access into the yard.
Opportunity has certainly coming knocking for the savvy investor, downsizer or first home buyers alike. A beautifully finished and presented unit that offers contemporary and practical living all within such an affordable price tag.
Insights: 1/32 Waulu Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Stellar Starter or Ideal Investment
This solid brick beauty is the perfect opportunity for first home buyers to enter the market, a low maintenance investment for all savvy investors or the perfect parcel of land and potential to optimize the Bay views to renovate and personalize down the track. A multitude of options are on offer; however, one thing is for sure - blink and you will miss this opportunity!
First impressions are everything which you will appreciate with such a beautifully manicured front garden. Upon entry you are greeted by the spacious living area, offering subtle Bay views, electric wall heater, split system flowing nicely into the formal dining. The generous sized kitchen with electric cooking and ample cupboards overlooks a flexible 2nd meals/family area. 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 with built-in-robes, the master bedroom offering a large walk-in-robe and en-suite with vanity and shower. The fully equipped central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry complete this neat package. The impressive gardens continue into the backyard, with established trees, a fernery and garden shed. The home also offers secure side access from the carport with plenty of room for a boat, caravan, multiple cars and everything in between.
Situated in a tightly held and quiet pocket of Clifton Springs set upon a 585m2 block - What's not to love? Public transport on your door step, shops, schools, cafes and not to mention an easy 10-minute stroll to the Bay! The Bellarine Peninsula is booming - This is your chance to secure your future at an entry level price.

Description:
Cathedral ceiling. Renovated. Yes!
Whether you're looking for a weekender, family home or an investment property, there is so much on offer here at 7 Achilpa Ave.
On the ground level, a large lounge provides a great breakout space when there's a conflict over who's watching what on TV, or plenty of room for a number of bunk beds if the kids want to bring some friends down for the weekend. A bedroom with BIR on this level provides great separation from the other two bedrooms upstairs, where you'll also enjoy a great study nook, central bathroom and separate toilet. Duck through the laundry and you'll find a massive alfresco and spa, perfect for both parties and Sunday BBQs.
A magnificent cathedral ceiling leads you upstairs again to the updated kitchen, dining and living. Providing the perfect vantage point looking back to the living and huge balcony, the kitchen boasts 40mm stone benchtops with waterfall edge, vinyl wrap cabinetry, stainless steel appliances and loads of storage.
A Jindara wood heater will provide warmth in the approaching cooler months, while split systems in the upstairs living and main bedroom manage the rest.
Side gated access means you can finally keep the boat or van at home, while keeping your car locked away in the garage.
Fishos will love being just moments from the ramp, and golfers spoilt for choice with Clifton Springs and Curlewis courses nearby. Clifton Springs Primary is within walking distance, and you can choose between the new Bayview Central or High St. shops. Awesome.
Enquire now and you could be calling 7 Achilpa Ave yours in no time.
Insights: 7 Achilpa Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
SPACIOUS FAMILY HOME
This established Clifton Springs home has been brought back to life with a stunning renovation perfect for the family looking for that extra bit of space or an extended family wanting privacy. Comprising no less than 5 bedrooms, master with walk in robe and full ensuite, formal central lounge with open fireplace and leading out to the magnificent alfresco entertaining area, kitchen/dining and sitting room perfect for family meals and a separate wing with a further 3 bedrooms and central activity room/study. A large separate rumpus room with external access creates a space for a pool table and games room or running a business from home with no requirement for clients to enter the main house. New flooring, ducted heating and car accommodation coupled with 5 bedrooms, multiple living zones and 840sqm of land, this family home is perfect for those looking to live in the thriving neighborhood of Clifton Springs with easy access to Geelong while enjoying all that the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula has to offer.
Insights: 20 Streeton Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
SOUGHT AFTER WATER VIEWS
Located just off the bay end of Beacon Point road amongst established housing in a quiet neighborhood. A short stroll to cliff top walks along the water and a lovely secluded swimming spot. The block is elevated to the rear and has great potential to secure beautiful views from your new home. Oriented to take advantage of the sun throughout the day. Public transport, the local shopping strip and kindergarten are available close by.
Blocks of these proportions rarely present in established Clifton Springs. Approximately 16m x 42m with an area of 677m2 get your house plans ready.
Insights: 22 Camberwarra Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019.
